sentences.en: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

sentences.en: Class size varies from one type of institution to another.
sentences.cn: 班级大小因院校类型而异。

sentences.en: Eve isn't the type to sit around doing nothing.
sentences.cn: 伊芙不是那种喜欢坐在那里无所事事的人。

sentences.en: He types with two fingers.
sentences.cn: 他用两个手指打字。

sentences.en: I particularly like the type of shelving that screws to the wall.
sentences.cn: 我尤其喜欢那种用螺钉固定在墙上的搁板。

sentences.en: I’ve already seen a few movies of this type.
sentences.cn: 我已经看过几部这种类型的影片了。

sentences.en: In 1990, 25% of households were of this type.
sentences.cn: 1990年，25%的家庭属于这种类型。

sentences.en: Incidents of this type cause irreparable damage to relations with the community.
sentences.cn: 这类事件会对与该社群的关系造成不可弥合的伤害。

sentences.en: italic type
sentences.cn: 斜体字

sentences.en: Jo’s not really the sporty type.
sentences.cn: 乔可不是那种喜欢运动的人。

sentences.en: Rates of interest for this type of borrowing can be high.
sentences.cn: 这种类型的借款利率可能会很高。

sentences.en: She was certainly not the type to murder her husband.
sentences.cn: 她绝不是那种会谋杀亲夫的人。

sentences.en: Speed was of the essence in a project of this type.
sentences.cn: 对于这种项目来说，速度至关重要。

sentences.en: The treatment regime may vary widely depending on the type of injury.
sentences.cn: 因受伤类型不同治疗方法可能有很大的区别。

sentences.en: This is the type of flood dreaded by cavers.
sentences.cn: 这正是洞穴探险者害怕的那种洪水。

sentences.en: This pub was of a very different type, smaller, less pretentious.
sentences.cn: 这个酒吧风格独特，面积不大，比较低调。

sentences.en: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentences.cn: 这种外科手术甚至可以用来切除癌性肿瘤。

sentences.en: Type your password, then press ‘Return’.
sentences.cn: 输入密码，然后按“回车”键。

sentences.en: Use bold type for headings and bullet points for noteworthy achievements.
sentences.cn: 标题使用粗黑字体，显著的成就要用着重号标示。

sentences.en: You have to type in commands, such as "help" and "print"
sentences.cn: 你必须输入命令,例如“帮助”或“打印”.

words.tran_cn: 用打字机打出的，打字的
用打字机打（typewrite的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 特种；特殊型；特殊型号的设备

trans.tran_cn: 类型，种类，一类（人或事物），…类型的人，印刷文字
trans.tran_en: one member of a group of people or things that have similar features or qualities
to write something using a computer or a  typewriter

trans.tran_cn: 打字， 用打字机打出
trans.tran_en: to write something using a computer or a  typewriter
